backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining comprehensive healthcare platform types (professionals, hospitals, vendors, NGOs, medical records, research projects, health records, medical tourism) with role-based access control, blob storage mixins, and CRUD operations for stakeholder management, registration requests, and approval workflows.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features for Network Directory redesign matching McKinsey's Our People page, including card-based layout, enhanced filtering, profile detail views, and associated test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, pages (Dashboard, Contact, Legal, Onboarding, Admin, Registration forms), components (Navigation, Chatbot, Request handling), hooks (React Query operations), and styling with McKinsey-inspired design system.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light/dark theme variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, sidebar, and chart colors using CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the AI Health Zon React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes (Onboarding, Home, About, Solutions, Healthcare Support, Network Directory, Network Map, Careers, Vendors, Ambulance, NGOs, Dashboard, Admin, Contact, Legal pages) with Layout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/Chatbot.tsx: Floating AI chatbot component with expandable interface, message history, auto-scroll, typing indicator, and contextual responses about healthcare services, contact info, RCM, technology, network directory, careers, vendors, ambulance, and NGOs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying brand identity, navigation links (Quick Links, Services, Legal), social media icons, and copyright information with responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps pages with Navigation header, main content area (Outlet), and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Main navigation header with responsive menu, dynamic links based on auth/admin status, login/logout button, and pending request badge for admins.
frontend/src/components/PendingRequestsL: Displays a list of pending requests (professional, vendor, ambulance, or NGO) using RequestDetailCard components with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form for new users to select account type (hospital, professional, vendor, NGO) and enter their name before accessing the platform.
frontend/src/components/RequestDetailCar: Expandable card component displaying detailed request information with approve/reject actions, contact buttons (WhatsApp, email), and formatted timestamps for admin review.
frontend/src/components/StakeholderDetai: Modal dialog showing comprehensive details of a stakeholder (Hospital, Vendor, or NGO) including contact info, services, and action buttons for communication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, hospitals, healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, and registration requests with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with McKinsey-inspired design system defining color palettes (light/dark modes), typography styles, and custom card hover effects using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About page displaying company mission, vision, core purpose, and value propositions for hospitals, healthcare professionals, vendors, and NGOs with icon-based cards.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page with access control that displays pending registration requests for healthcare professionals, vendors, NGOs, and ambulances in tabbed interface with summary statistics.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceServices.tsx: Ambulance service registration and search page with form for submitting new ambulance services (name, location, contact, service types) and search functionality to find ambulance services by city. Includes PIN code auto-lookup for city/state and integrates with backend queries for registration and retrieval.
frontend/src/pages/Careers.tsx: Healthcare professional job application page with form for submitting career applications including role selection, experience, location, contact details, and CV upload. Features PIN code auto-lookup, file upload with progress tracking, and integration with backend registration mutation.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying company contact information (address, phone, email, WhatsApp) and a contact form for user inquiries. Includes a chatbot component and simulated form submission with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard page that displays different metrics and cards based on user type (hospital vs professional), showing revenue, claims, staff requests, vendors, compliance for hospitals, and job applications, appointments, earnings for professionals. Includes authentication check and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/pages/HealthcareSupportSyst: Informational page displaying 12 healthcare support service categories (workforce, ambulance, diagnostics, pharmacy, home healthcare, mental health, vendors, NGOs, compliance, insurance, training, logistics) with icons, titles, descriptions, and detailed explanations in a grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero carousel showcasing platform benefits, value propositions with icons, and call-to-action buttons linking to About and Contact pages.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkDirectory.tsx: Directory page displaying hospitals, vendors, and NGOs with search, category, and location filters; includes detail view modal for selected stakeholders.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkMap.tsx: Network visualization page showing aggregated stakeholder locations by city/state with statistics cards and a scrollable list of locations.
frontend/src/pages/NgoListing.tsx: NGO registration form with auto-fill location from PIN code and filterable list of approved NGOs by location and focus area.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Interactive onboarding flow that auto-plays through stakeholder approvals with animations, skip option, and replay functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Static privacy policy page displaying information collection, usage, sharing, security, and user rights in a card layout.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Displays a static refund policy page with sections covering eligibility, request process, processing time, non-refundable items, and cancellations. Uses Card components to present policy information with dynamic last-updated date.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions.tsx: Presents healthcare solutions organized into three verticals (RCM, Technology, and Marketplace) with detailed feature lists using CheckCircle icons. Each vertical includes an icon image and multiple service offerings displayed in a grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditions.tsx: Displays static terms and conditions page covering acceptance of terms, service usage, user responsibilities, intellectual property, liability limitations, and modifications. Uses Card components with dynamic last-updated date.
frontend/src/pages/Vendors.tsx: Vendor registration page with a form for submitting vendor details (name, category, products, contact info, location) and displays list of approved vendors. Includes automatic PIN code lookup to populate city/state fields and integrates with backend mutations for registration submission.
frontend/src/utils/pinCodeLookup.ts: Utility function that validates and looks up Indian PIN codes using the India Post API (postalpincode.in) to retrieve city and state information. Returns structured result with success status and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support. Includes functions to get, store, clear, and persist parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system with CSS variables for theming (primary, secondary, destructive, sidebar, header, etc.), custom border radius, box shadows, and font families. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for AI Health Zon, a multi-stakeholder healthcare platform with RCM, Healthcare Technology, and Connecting Platform features. Tracks 25 versions, includes architectural notes for role-based auth, admin approval workflows, PIN code auto-fill, and lists existing features with requirement IDs.
